bodyMainContentArray.bodyMainContent: I have read and understood this advance order form of Titan Company Limited (Company) and the contents appearing herein, including the remarks column, which I fully agree.

subBullettedPoints.bullettedPointContent: I hereby undertake that irrespective of whatever be the gold / platinum / silver prevailing on the date of actual billing, I shall accept the gold / platinum / silver rate that I have frozen on this advance order date: I shall not raise any claims or dispute or company if the gold/ platinum / silver rate falls on actual billing date, due to market volatility or delay or any Change from my end

From the booking date, if the product appearing in the advance order is not collected within 15 days of receipt at boutique, the order will automatically stand cancelled and the amount paid there under would be forfeited and the company, besides not being held responsible for this, shall also have the right to product to any other third party or customer

In other cases of payment (Except Cash) for purchase above Rs.2 lakhs paid by Credit card / Cheque, PAN CARD Copy or Form 60 (as per IT rules) with Valid photo id may be given at time of Advance or Billing

Any conditions which are explicitly not covered above would be the discretion of the company, at the time of transaction. The decision of the company in this regard would be deemed as irrevocable and final
NA – Not Applicable, since the product is sold by piece / number
